DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate left ventricular systolic ejection fraction and anterior or apical akinesis 1 month and 3 months after a myocardial infarction treated with primary PCI to determine whether improvement at 1 month differs from improvement at 3 months.
DOC.brief_title: Objective Systolic Function Recuperation Assessed by Echocardiography
